name: Chrono-Fractal Memory Hierarchy
summary: Rules for storing working and finished markdown memories within the temporal Heartwood.

principles.name: Working Documents (Context)
principles.rule: All intermediate drafts, versioned reports (e.g., V4, V5), and working session artifacts must be stored in the 'md/context/' subdirectory of their respective temporal branch.

principles.name: Finished Documents (Heartwood)
principles.rule: Only the final, polished versions of articles, reports, and strategic crystallizations are stored in the root 'md/' directory of their respective temporal branch.
